FuncDef:
The ospf flush-source-trace block command disables OSPF flush LSA source tracing on an interface.
The undo ospf flush-source-trace block command enables OSPF flush LSA source tracing on an interface. The ospf flush-source-trace block command disables OSPF flush LSA source tracing on an interface. The undo ospf flush-source-trace block command enables OSPF flush LSA source tracing on an interface. By default, OSPF flush LSA source tracing is enabled on all interfaces.
